actions.Name: Solid Reason
actions.Description:
Grants another gathering attempt. When gathering collectables, restores 1 integrity.
Additional Effect: 50% chance to grant Eureka Moment

actions.Name: Sharp Vision
actions.Description: Increases the chance of obtaining items while gathering by 5%. Does not apply to items at 0%.

actions.Name: Sharp Vision II
actions.Description: Increases the chance of obtaining items while gathering by 15%. Does not apply to items at 0%.

actions.Name: King's Yield
actions.Description: Increases the number of items obtained when gathering by one.

actions.Name: Collect
actions.Description:
Gathers a collectable item with its current collectability rating.
Reduces integrity by 1.

actions.Name: King's Yield II
actions.Description: Increases the number of items obtained when gathering by two.

actions.Name: Bountiful Yield II
actions.Description: Increases the number of items obtained on your next gathering attempt by one, two, or three. Number determined by your gathering rating.

actions.Name: the Twelve's Bounty
actions.Description:
Increases elemental shard, crystal, and cluster yields by 3.
Cannot be executed if the gathering node does not yield shards, crystals, or clusters.

actions.Name: Sharp Vision III
actions.Description: Increases the chance of obtaining items while gathering by 50%. Does not apply to items at 0%.

actions.Name: Sneak
actions.Description: Tread quietly, enabling you to avoid enemies up to four levels above your own.

actions.Name: Clear Vision
actions.Description: Increases the chance of obtaining items on your next gathering attempt by 15%. Does not apply to items at 0%.

actions.Name: Bountiful Yield
actions.Description: Increases the number of items obtained on your next gathering attempt by one.

actions.Name: Luck of the Mountaineer
actions.Description: Uncovers a gathering node's hidden items.

actions.Name: The Giving Land
actions.Description:
Increases elemental shard, crystal, and cluster yields by a random amount.
Effect can be stacked with The Twelve's Bounty.
Cannot be executed if the gathering node does not yield shards, crystals, or clusters.

actions.Name: Mountaineer's Gift I
actions.Description: Increases the chance of triggering Gatherer's Boon by 10%. Does not apply to items at 0%.

actions.Name: Nald'thal's Tidings
actions.Description: Increases item yield from Gatherer's Boon by 1.

actions.Name: Collector's Focus
actions.Description: Increases the chance to trigger Collector's Intuition by 75% on your next collectable action.

actions.Name: Scour
actions.Description:
Increases collectability of an item. Increase is determined by your gathering rating.
Reduces integrity by 1.

actions.Name: Brazen Prospector
actions.Description:
Increases the collectability of an item. Increase is a random amount ranging from 50% to 150% of the effectiveness of Scour.
Reduces integrity by 1.

actions.Name: Meticulous Prospector
actions.Description:
Increases collectability of an item. Increase is 75% of the effectiveness of Scour.
Reduces integrity by 1. There is a chance integrity is unaffected, determined by your gathering rating.

actions.Name: Scrutiny
actions.Description: Improves next item collectability increase. Effect is determined by your perception rating.

actions.Name: Mountaineer's Gift II
actions.Description:
Increases the chance of triggering Gatherer's Boon by 30%. Does not apply to items at 0%.
Effect can be stacked with Mountaineer's Gift I.

actions.Name: Wise to the World
actions.Description:
Grants another gathering attempt. When gathering collectables, restores 1 integrity.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Eureka Moment.

actions.Name: Priming Touch
actions.Description:
Doubles the chance your next use of Meticulous Prospector will not affect integrity.
Does not affect increased chance from gathering point bonuses or Collector's High Standard.

roleActions.Name: Prospect
roleActions.Description: Surveys the landscape to locate mineral deposits and rocky outcrops. Activates automatically when class is changed to miner.

roleActions.Name: Lay of the Land
roleActions.Description:
Surveys the landscape to locate the nearest mineral deposit or rocky outcrop within skill range. Can only be executed while Prospect is active.
Duration: 15s

roleActions.Name: Truth of Mountains
roleActions.Description: Further surveys the landscape to uncover unspoiled, legendary, and clouded mineral deposits and rocky outcrops.

roleActions.Name: Lay of the Land II
roleActions.Description:
Surveys the landscape to locate the highest-level mineral deposit or rocky outcrop within skill range. Can only be executed while Prospect is active.
Duration: 15s

roleActions.Name: Triangulate
roleActions.Description: Surveys the landscape to locate mature trees and lush vegetation. Activates automatically when class is changed to botanist.

roleActions.Name: Arbor Call
roleActions.Description:
Surveys the landscape to locate the nearest mature tree or lush vegetation within skill range. Can only be executed while Triangulate is active.
Duration: 15s

roleActions.Name: Truth of Forests
roleActions.Description: Further surveys the landscape to uncover unspoiled, legendary, and clouded mature trees and lush vegetation.

roleActions.Name: Arbor Call II
roleActions.Description:
Surveys the landscape to locate the highest-level mature tree or lush vegetation within skill range. Can only be executed while Triangulate is active.
Duration: 15s

roleActions.Name: Fathom
roleActions.Description: Surveys the seas to locate teeming waters. Activates automatically when class is changed to fisher.

roleActions.Name: Shark Eye
roleActions.Description:
Surveys the seas to locate the nearest teeming waters within skill range. Can only be executed while Fathom is active.
Duration: 15s

roleActions.Name: Shark Eye II
roleActions.Description:
Surveys the landscape to locate the highest-level teeming waters within skill range. Can only be executed while Fathom is active.
Duration: 15s

roleActions.Name: Truth of Oceans
roleActions.Description: Further surveys the seas to uncover the nearest swimming shadows within skill range.
